Package model.user.repository

Interface UserRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
SqliteUserRepository
public interface UserRepository
Interface to manage the user data in the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    @Nullable User getUserById​(int id)
    Finds the user in the database based on its id.
    @Nullable User getUserByUsername​(java.lang.String username)
    Finds the user in the database based on its username, used when managing the members of a team.
    int getUserId​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
    Gets the user's id when validating the sign-in operation.
    void saveUser​(User user)
    When saving the user, only the username and the password are specified.
    void updateUser​(User user)
    Updates the fields of an existing user.

  • Method Details

    • saveUser

      void saveUser​(User user) throws java.sql.SQLException, DuplicateUsernameException
      When saving the user, only the username and the password are specified. The user's id is automatically generated when the record is added to the User table. The username has to be unique, there cannot be
      Parameters:
      user - = the user to be saved
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if the user could not be saved
      DuplicateUsernameException - if the username is already taken

    • getUserId

      int getUserId​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Gets the user's id when validating the sign-in operation.
      Parameters:
      username - = introduced by the user at sign-in
      password - = password introduced by the user at sign-in
      Returns:
      teh user's id when the sign-in was successful, otherwise a negative integer.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if the data could not be rea from the database.

    • getUserById

      @Nullable @Nullable User getUserById​(int id) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Finds the user in the database based on its id.
      Parameters:
      id - = the id of the user
      Returns:
      the User who has that id
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if the data could not be accessed in the database.

    • getUserByUsername

      @Nullable @Nullable User getUserByUsername​(java.lang.String username) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Finds the user in the database based on its username, used when managing the members of a team.
      Parameters:
      username - = username of the user
      Returns:
      User who has that username
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if the data could not be accessed in the database.

    • updateUser

      void updateUser​(User user) throws java.sql.SQLException, InexistentDatabaseEntityException
      Updates the fields of an existing user.
      Parameters:
      user - = the user with the new attributes
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if an error occurs at reading from the database
      InexistentDatabaseEntityException
